lines.text: every man here will ride a white horse, wear a black shirt and a white scarf. And this way we'll know each other in battle. I'm asking for single men only. Men who'll stick. Who'll join me here?
Oh, Carter, have the boys mount up. We'll go into Red Bluff and spend the evening. Maybe some of the boys would like a little sarsaparilla.
Maybe they would. Me too. I'll tell 'em.
Hey, stupid! Where do you think you're going? Get back there with the herd, you muttonhead!
Just who do you think you're talking to? And who are you calling muttonhead?
And just what are you doing here, I may ask?
Well, I'm the new trail boss
Well my name's Mary Gordon and my father owns this outfit. So from now on, it's 'Miss Gordon' to you, not 'muttonhead', you dumbbell!
